Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. This product is not just an item, it's a solution tailored to enhance your experience. Considering its quality and functionality, I believe it's worth more than its face value. For this exceptional offering, I am proposing a special introductory price of $200. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to consider it carefully. If you have any questions or need more information, please let me know. I look forward to the opportunity to serve you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $200. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $200
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
